resources.string: At least one name is required
At least one Last name is required
The name must not have special characters, it can only have a space between the first and second names
The last name must not have special characters, it can only have a space between the first and second last names
Names must be capitalized at the beginning and must not be capitalized after the first letter of names
Last names must have a capital letter at the beginning and must not have capital letters after the first letter of the last names

There should not be two accents in the name and there can only be two ñ if the first is at the beginningThere should not be two accents in the name and there can only be two ñ if the first is at the beginning
There should not be two accents in the last name and there can only be two ñ if the first is at the beginning
The account number must be 9 digits
You must enter a valid date
You cannot enter an age under 10 years
